scripts.clean: rm -r build ; rm -r ../static/* ; rm ../login/templates/layout.html ; mkdir -p ../login/templates && echo "Building front end...reload when complete." > ../login/templates/layout.html
scripts.build: npm run clean ; npm run buildonly
scripts.buildonly: mkdir -p ../login/templates/ && mkdir -p ../static && react-scripts build && cp -r build/static/* ../static/ && cp -r public/static/* ../static/ && cp build/index.html ../login/templates/layout.html
scripts.test: npm run clean && standard --fix && react-scripts test --env=jsdom
